original_text: In the same way, you will see all these strange things happening. Then you will know that the Son of Man will come very soon. He will be like someone at the door who is ready to come in.
korean_text: 이와 같이 너희도 이 모든 일을 보거든 인자가 가까이 곧 문 앞에 이른 줄 알라

sentences.original_text: you will see all these strange things happening.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 이 모든 기이한 일들이 일어나는 것을 보게 될 것이다.

sentences.original_text: that the Son of Man will come very soon.
He will be like someone at the door
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 문에 있는 사람처럼 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: who is ready to come in.
